answers.answer: Your Dr. will go over the results with you at your nect Dr. visit. If you had a really bad out come they would have called you to come in earlier. For example if your test came back that you would need to be put on medication they would call you in as soon as they could. Don't worry so much I am sure your tests came back perfect. Even if your tests came back that you have gestational diabetes it isn't that bad I have it and all I have to do is test my blood sugar 3-4 times a day,
I would wait if anything they tell u results on ur nxt doc visit
Ohh! Thank you! I was just expecting a phone call because the lab tech said somebody would call me when they got the results in.
My doctor always says no news is good news.  So if you haven't heard anything then it probably means you passed, but they told me it would take a week for the results to come back anyway.
That's what I'm telling myself,  that no news is goos news lol. The lady said the results would be in that afternoon. I'm not gonna worry, I bet I'm fine! :) thank u ladies
My doctor told me if she didn't call me then I passed. And sure enough at my next appointment she said I passed with flying colors

question: But, I did my sugar test thing on Monday and still haven't heard anything back if I passed or not. Idk if I should keep waiting or call my doctor's office or the lab.
title: I know I just posted...
